curam.omega3.user
Class UserPreferencesFactory

java.lang.Object
  curam.omega3.user.UserPreferencesFactory

public final class UserPreferencesFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory class that retrieves a user's preferences from the session object.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CURRENT_USER_LOCALE_PARAM
          The name of the session attribute for the user's current locale set in http session.
static java.lang.String USER_PREFS_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
          The key in the session object for the user preferences.

Method Detail

getUserPreferences

public static UserPreferences getUserPreferences(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
Retrieves the user preferences from the specified session object. If there are no user preferences in the session, they are created.

Parameters:
session - the HTTP session.
Returns:
The user preferences object.
